## About OmniOutliner
OmniOutliner provides a sophisticated yet accessible environment for organizing thoughts, plans, and information in structured document formats. Unlike standard text editors, OmniOutliner embraces hierarchy as a fundamental organizing principle, allowing users to expand and collapse sections, rearrange content effortlessly, and maintain clarity in complex documents. The application serves as a versatile tool for everything from simple checklists to detailed project plans and research papers.

The desktop application delivers the full OmniOutliner experience across both macOS and Windows platforms, featuring robust styling options, template support, and multiple viewing modes. Whether used for meeting agendas, academic research, creative writing, or task management, OmniOutliner's flexible column system and powerful organization features enable users to capture and structure information in ways that match their thinking process while maintaining the ability to export to various formats for sharing and presentation.

## âš™ï¸ System Requirements

**For macOS:**
*   macOS Monterey 12.0 or later
*   64-bit processor
*   4 GB RAM (8 GB recommended)
*   500 MB of available storage space

**For Windows:**
*   Windows 10 (64-bit) or later
*   4 GB RAM (8 GB recommended)
*   DirectX 11 compatible graphics card
*   500 MB of available storage space
